mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(computer_num),0) from t_net_bar where district_code like concat(#{areaCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and isdeleted = 0
select ifnull(sum(computer_num),0) from t_net_bar where city_code = #{areaCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdeleted = 0
select ifnull(sum(computer_num),0) from t_net_bar where isdeleted = 0

select ifnull(count(*),0) from t_net_bar where

select ifnull(count(*),0) from t_net_bar where city_code = #{areaCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdeleted = 0
select ifnull(count(*),0) from t_net_bar where isdeleted = 0
